sentence.Network_en: His last book, "Needful Things", was a retread of tired material.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的上一本书《必需品》尽在重复些老掉牙的内容。

PerfectNetExp.abs: GB/T 6326—2005　轮胎术语及其定义 ... 轮胎换位 tyre rotation 翻新 retread 翻新轮胎 retreaded tyre.
轮胎翻新(retread)1.废弃轮胎回收后，是如何再制的，我要清楚的处理过程。

list.abs: retreading是什么意思及反义词... ... tire retreading 【化】 轮胎翻修 retreading machine 翻新机 retreading road 道路翻新.
retransmitter 转播发射机retreaded tire 翻新轮胎retreaded tyre 翻新轮胎

entry.def: If you describe something such as a book, film, or song as a retread, you mean that it contains ideas or elements that have been used before, and that it is not very interesting or original.

example.ex: His last book, 'Needful Things', was a retread of tired material.
example.tran: 他的上一本书《必需品》尽在重复些老掉牙的内容。

entry.def: A retread is an old tyre which has been given a new surface or tread and can be used again.

means.word_mean: 1. a used automobile tire that has been remolded to give it new treads

auth_sentence.content: But this is no Brokeback Mountain retread.
